feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.6Â°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of snow. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
